Sentencas: Chromium oxide vapor species that influence cathode degradation were studied and the effect of a cathode second layer that suppresses chromium diffusion to the cathode was investigated in an SOFC using an alloy separator.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: PCrO2(OH)(2) has the highest value at high PH2O condition and PCrO3 becomes highest at low PH2O condition (similar to 10(-4) atm).
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: The cathode degradation rate seemed to be influenced by the total vapor pressure of all gaseous species of chromium.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: The PH2O dependence of the cell life indicated that cathode degradation can be reduced by decreasing PH2O so far as that PCrO2(OH)(2) is equal to PCrO3.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: Chromium diffusion to the cathode was suppressed by adopting a cathode second layer that contains La2O3.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: This effect seemed to be caused by the reaction of La2O3 with the chromium vapor which decreased the chromium vapor pressure in the cathode.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: The life of the cell with the cathode second layer was extended by decreasing the cathode polarization and the chromium vapor pressure from the alloy.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer

Sentencas: Almost all La2O3 in the cathode second layer seemed to react with the chromium vapor and contribute to the increase in cell life.
Titulo: Suppression of chromium diffusion to an SOFC cathode from an alloy separator by a cathode second layer
